messages: 7c566a1cbf0962c12b6119c44c48f632 (03:18): is there a way to install mod_proxy to an already compiled apache?

b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (03:24): apxs is for building modules as DSOs, and is put into the Apache /bin/ directory by 'make install' or http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/programs/apxs.html or for debian, called 'apxs2' or for windows, see: http://perl.apache.org/dist/win32-bin/
7c566a1cbf0962c12b6119c44c48f632 (03:25): noodl, and is available for apache 1.x ?
1b70f328e83584318ab35ff5c7c96056 (03:27): Erm, yes iirc. Haven't used 1.3 for a few years.

b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (03:29): livehttpheaders is a useful extension for Mozilla/Firefox which allows you view client and server headers or available here: http://livehttpheaders.mozdev.org/
74fef624eaff0ee049a697a2385c68b9 (03:30): Hello all, I placed my webfiles in my htdocs folder and I get this how do I resolve? and what is the config file name for apache http://72.80.24.44:85
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (03:31): No matter what the problem is, step one is to look in the error log or see error log
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (03:31): Which OS/Distro are you running
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (03:31): gentoo is more painful or see ricer

1b70f328e83584318ab35ff5c7c96056 (03:37): pushpop: If you find your error log and config file in gentoo you could help us out.. There's a page http://trac.eta-beta-pi.net/wiki/HowTo/Distros-default-layout we maintain containing distro specific layout information. gentoo is missing..
